form.IN:
V ameriški angleščini
fit
lahko uporabljamo tudi kot obliko za preteklik in pretekli deležnik.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
fits
, je prave velikosti in oblike za določeno osebo ali predmet ali pa je zanju na določen način primerno.

seg.quote: The metal cover fits over the tap.
The description fits women better than it fits men.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
a good fit
, se nam dobro prilega.

Kadar nekaj
fits into something else
, je dovolj majhno, da gre v nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: All my clothes fit into one suitcase.

sense.def:
To fit something into the right space or place
pomeni nekaj dati na pravi prostor ali kraj.

seg.quote: Philip fitted his key into the lock.

sense.def:
To fit something somewhere
pomeni nekaj previdno in varno nekam dati.

seg.quote: Castors can be fitted to a bed to make it easier to pull.
The kitchen has been fitted with a stainless steel sink.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekdo ali nekaj
fit for a particular purpose
, je primerno ali uporabno za določen namen.

seg.quote: The houses are now fit for human habitation.
She regarded herself as fit to be a governess.

sense.def:
Kdor je
fit
, je zdrav in telesno močan.

seg.quote: She works hard at keeping fit.
They were trained to a peak of physical fitness.

sense.def:
To have a fit
pomeni nenadoma izgubiti zavest; pri tem telo nenadzorovano trza.

To have a fit of coughing or laughter
pomeni nenadoma začeti neobvladljivo kašljati ali se smejati.

To do something in a fit of anger or panic
pomeni biti zelo jezen ali prestrašen, ko nekaj storimo.

seg.quote: In a fit of rage, he had flung Paul's violin out of the window.

sense.def:
To see fit to do something
pomeni skleniti, da je prav, če nekaj storimo;

seg.quote: The present government has seen fit to cut back on spending.

sense.def:
Kadar se nekaj dogaja
in fits and starts
, se dogaja in spet preneha.

To fit something in
ali
to fit something into one's schedule
pomeni najti čas, da nekaj storimo.

seg.quote: You seem to fit in an enormous amount every day.

sense.def:
To fit in
ali
to fit into a group
pomeni biti podoben drugim osebam v skupini.

seg.quote: These children are unable to fit into ordinary society when they leave school.
